check.title: Structural - Error: DB030 - Household ID must be unique
Structural - Error: HB030 - Household ID must be unique
Structural - Error: RB030 - Personal ID must be unique when RB110 not equal to 5
check.where: RB110 ne 5

check.title: Structural - Error: PB030 - Personal ID must be unique
Structural - Error: RB030 RB040 - R-file filled in but corresponding household does not exist in D-file
Structural - Error: HB030 - H-file filled in but corresponding household does not exist in D-file
Structural - Error: PB030 - P-file filled in but corresponding person does not exist in R-file
Weights - Error: DB090 - Household (DB090) vs Personal (RB050) cross-sectional weight mismatch
check.where: (DB090 ge 0) AND (RB050 ge 0) AND (ABS(DB090 - RB050) gt 0.01*DB090)

check.title: Income - Error: HY020 - No disposable household income , but components with income
check.where: HY020 = 0 and sum(NET20,0) ne 0

check.title: Income - Error: HY010 - No total household income , but components with income
check.having: HY010 = 0 and sum(HNETINC,HGROINC,PNETINC,PGROINC,0) ne 0 and HGROINC ne 0

check.title: Income - Warning: HY010 - Great difference between total and components
check.where: (HY010 GT 0) AND (HY010 lt gross * 0.9 OR HY010 gt gross * 1.1)

check.title: Income - Warning: HY020 - Should be equal or greater than HY022 (except if pay-backs are taken into account)
check.where: HY020 GT 0 and HY022 GT HY020

check.title: Income - Error: HY022- Must be equal or greater HY023
check.where: HY022 GT 0 and HY023 GT HY022

check.title: Income - Warning: HY020 - Great difference between total and components
check.where: HY020 GT 0 and (HY020 LT net20 * 0.9 or HY020 GT net20 * 1.1)

check.title: Income - Warning: HY020 HH070 - Total housing cost > total net income
check.where: HH070 GT 0 and (HH070 * 12) GT HY020

check.title: Income - Error: PY020G should include company car (PY021G)
check.where: (PY020G LT PY021G)

check.title: Labour - Error: PL073 - PL090 - Sum of months not equal to 12 or 0
Housing Cost - Error: Rent is higher than total housing cost
check.where: (HH060 GT HH070) and (HH070_F gt 0)

check.title: Structural - Error: RB100 - If 4 year rotational panel: Person should be sample person (applicable only for non-selected respondent countries)
check.where: RB110 = 1 and DB110 = 9 and (RB245 in (1,2) or (RB245 = 4 and AGE ge 16)) and RB100 ne 1

check.title: Labour - Error: Duration of the most recent unemployment spell: routing condition (-2) based on age improperly applied
check.where: (PL271_F = -2) and (b.RB082 ge 16) and (b.RB082 le 74) and (PB010 ge 2021) and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Labour - Error: Duration of the most recent unemployment spell: routing condition (-2) based on age was expected
check.where: ((PL271_F ne -2) and ((b.RB082 lt 16) or (b.RB082 gt 75)) and (PB010 ge 2021)) and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Structural - Warning: RB080 RB090 - Age at date of interview is -1
Labour - Warning: PL088 Nr of Months in compulsory military service > 1 but younger than 18 or older than 55
check.where: (b.AGE LT 18 or b.AGE GT 55) and (PL088 GT 1) and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Status - Warning: Self defined economic status as in compulsory military service but younger than 18 or older than 55
check.where: ((b.AGE LT 18 or b.AGE GT 55) and PL031=9) and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Labour - Warning: PL031 Self defined economic status as in compulsory military service but younger than 18 or older than 55
check.where: ((b.AGE LT 18 or b.AGE GT 55) and PL031=9) and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Labour - Warning:PL085 Nr of Months in Retirement > 1 but younger than 27
check.where: (b.AGE LT 27) and (PL085 GT 1) and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Structural - Warning: HB080 - Age of Person 1 responsible for the accomodation is below 16
check.where: HB080_F ge 0 and AGE LT 16 and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Structural - Warning: HB090 - Age of Person 2 responsible for the accomodation is below 16
check.where: HB090_F ge 0 and AGE LT 16 and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Child Care - Error: RL010 - Value of variable not possible because of age
check.where: (RL010_F ne -2 and age gt 12)

check.title: Child Care - Error: RL020 - Value of variable not possible because of age
check.where: (RL020_F ne -2 and age gt 12)

check.title: Child Care - Error: RL030 - Value of variable not possible because of age
check.where: (RL030_F ne -2 and age gt 12)

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB230 - Mother is not household member or does not exist
check.on: a.RB230 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: a.RB230_F ge 0 and b.RB030 = . and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB230 - The person cannot be his own mother
check.where: RB030 = RB230 and RB110 NE 5

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB240 - Spouse/partner is not household member or does not exist
check.on: a.RB240 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: a.RB240_F ge 0 and b.RB030 = . and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB240 - The person cannot be his own spouse/partner
check.where: RB030 = RB240 and RB110 NE 5

check.title: Relationship - Error: PB160 PB170 PB180 - Parents and/or spouse/partner must be equal in R- and P-file
check.on: PB030 = RB030 and RB010 = PB010 and RHID = PHID
check.where: ((PB160_F ge 0 and PB160 ne RB220) or (PB170_F ge 0 and PB170 ne RB230) or (PB180_F ge 0 and PB180 ne RB240)) and RB030 ne . and (RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB220 - Father is not household member or does not exist
check.on: a.RB220 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: a.RB220_F ge 0 and b.RB030 = . and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB220 - The person cannot be his own father
check.where: RB030 = RB220 and RB110 NE 5

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB240 - Father and spouse(partner) cannot be the same
check.where: RB220_F ge 0 and RB240_F ge 0 and RB220 = RB240

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB240 - Father and spouse(partner) cannot be the same
check.where: RB230_F ge 0 and RB240_F ge 0 and RB230 = RB240

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB240 - The spouse/partner is not the same for both
check.select: a.RB010,a.RHID,a.RB030,a.RB110, a.RB240,b.RB030 as s_RB030,b.RB240 as s_RB240, b.RB110 as s_RB110
check.on: a.RB240 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: a.RB240_F GT 0 and b.RB110 in (1,2,3,4) and a.RB030 ne b.RB240 and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Error: RB240 - Parents of spouses/partners must be different
check.select: a.RB010,a.RHID,a.RB030,a.RB220,a.RB230,a.RB240,b.RB030 as s_RB030,b.RB220 as s_RB220,b.RB230 as s_RB230,b.RB240 as s_RB240
check.on: a.RB240 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: ((a.RB220_F ge 0 and a.RB220 = b.RB220) or (a.RB230_F ge 0 and a.RB230 = b.RB230)) and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Warning: RB220 - Sex of father is female
check.on: a.RB220 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: b.RB090 = 2 and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Warning: RB230 - Sex of mother is male
check.on: a.RB230 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: b.RB090 = 1 and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Warning: RB230 - Child should be at least 15 years younger than its mother
check.on: a.RB230 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: a.RB230_F ge 0 and b.AGE - a.AGE LT 15 and a.AGE ge 0 and b.AGE ge 0 and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Relationship - Warning: RB230 - Child should be at least 15 years younger than its father
check.on: a.RB220 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: a.RB220_F ge 0 and b.AGE - a.AGE LT 15 and a.AGE ge 0 and b.AGE ge 0 and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Longitudinal - Error: PL200 - number of years spent at work cannot be less than previous year
check.where: (a.PB010+1 = b.PB010) and (b.PL120 not is missing) and (a.PL200 GT b.PL200)

check.title: Longitudinal - Error: DB075 must be the same every year
Longitudinal - Error: DB040 must be the same every year if household is at the same adress
check.where: b.DB110 = 1 and a.DB010+1 = b.DB010 and a.DB040 ne b.DB040

check.title: Longitudinal - Error: DB100 must be the same every year if household is at the same adress
check.where: b.DB110 = 1 and a.DB010+1 = b.DB010 and a.DB100 ne b.DB100

check.title: Structural - Error (follow-up): RB110 = 1,5 or 6 => must be 1,2,3 or 4 in previous year
check.where: a.RB010+1 = b.RB010 and b.RB110 in (1,5,6) and a.RB110 not in (1,2,3,4) and (a.RB110 NE 5) and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Structural - Error (follow-up): RB110 = 2,3,4 or 7 => household member should not exist in previous year
check.where: a.RB010+1 = b.RB010 and b.RB110 in (2,3,4,7) and a.RB110 not in (2,5,7) and (a.RB110 NE 5) and (b.RB110 NE 5)

check.title: Longitudinal - Error: RB080 - Year of birth must be the same every year
check.where: RB110 NE 5

check.title: Longitudinal - Error: RB090 - Sex must be the same every year
check.where: RB110 NE 5

check.title: Longitudinal - Warning: RB220 - Father should be the same every year
check.where: RB220 ne . and RB110 NE 5

check.title: Longitudinal - Warning: RB230 - Mother should be the same every year
check.where: RB230 ne . and RB110 NE 5

check.title: Longitudinal - Error: RB245 - Respondant status (16+) must be the same every year
check.where: RB245 in (1,2,3) and RB110 NE 5

check.title: Longitudinal - Error: RB040 must be the same every year if person was in this household in previous waves
check.where: b.RB110 = 1 and a.RB110 in (1,2,3,4) and a.RB010+1 = b.RB010 and a.RB040 ne b.RB040 and a.RB110 NE 5 and b.RB110 NE 5

check.title: Structural - Error: DB110 must be 9 for household first time in survey
Structural - Error: DB110 must be 8 for split-off household first time in survey
check.where: mod(DB030,100) GT 0

check.title: Structural - Error: RB245 - Codes 1 and (2,3) cannot be mixed within the same household
Structural - Error: RB245 - Only one person can be selected respondant in the same household
Structural - Error: RB110 must be 1 for household first time in survey
check.where: (RB110 NOT IN (1,7) and DB110 = 9 and RB010 LT 2021) or (RB110 NE 1 and RB010 GE 20201 and DB110 EQ 9)

check.title: Structural - Error: A sample person moved from another household must have RB110=5 and RB120 = 1 in the prevoius household
check.on: a.RB030 = b.RB030 and a.RHID ne b.RHID and a.RB010 = b.RB010
check.where: a.RB100 = 1 and (a.RB110 ne 5 or a.RB120 ne 1) and b.RB110 = 2

check.title: Structural - Error: HB080 - Person 1 and person 2 responsible for the accomodation cannot be the same person
check.where: HB080_F ge 0 and HB080 = HB090

check.title: Income - Warning: PY010 - 12 months active as employee, but no income as employee
Income - Warning: PY050 - 12 months active as self-employee, but no income as self-employee
Income - Warning: PY090 - 12 months unemployed, but no income from unemployments benefits
Income - Warning: PY100 - 12 months retired, but no income from old-age benefits
Labour - Warning: PL031 PL060 PL100 Nr of hours usually worked is less than 20 hours per week while the self-declared status is full-time
check.where: (Sum(PL060, PL100) LT 20 and PL031 in (1,3) and PL060 not is missing and PL100 not is missing)

check.title: Labour - Error: PL020: Actively looking for a job : The person is currently working (PL031 in (1,2,3,4))
check.where: PL031 in (1,2,3,4) and PL020_F ne -2

check.title: Education - Error: PE030 - Highest level of education attained before born
check.where: PE030_F = 1 and PE030 LT PB140

check.title: Structural - Error: RB270 - Proxy is not household member or does not exist
check.on: a.RB270 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
check.where: a.RB270_F ge 0 and a.RHID ne b.RHID and b.RB110 NE 5

check.title: Structural - Error: RB270 - The person cannot be proxy for himself
check.where: RB270_F ge 0 and RB030 = RB270

check.title: Child Care - Error: RL010,RL020 - Child cannot be at (the age of) pre-school and compulsory school in the same week
check.where: ((RL010 GE 0 and RL020 GE 0) or (RL010 GE 0 and RL020_F =-1) or (RL010_F= -1 and RL020 GE 0))

check.title: Child Care - Error: RL030 - Should be filled only if child is at pre-school or at compulsory school
check.where: RL010_F = -2 and RL020_F = -2 and RL030_F ne -2

check.title: Child Care - Warning: Value for RL070 not realistic
check.where: (RL070_F = 1) AND (RL070 le 1 or RL070 ge 20000) AND (RB110 in (1 2 3 4))

check.title: Child Care - Warning: Sum of weekly hours greater than 84 (more than 12 hours daily on average)
Child Care - Error: Sum of weekly hours greater than 168 (more than 24 hours daily on average)
Child Care -Error: RL030 filled in but neither RL010 nor RL020 greater than 0
check.where: RL030_F ne -2 and (RL010 = 0 or RL020 = 0)

check.title: Child Care -Error: RL030 cannot be not-applicable if RL010 or RL020 filled in (or missing)
check.where: ( ((RL010 GT 0 or RL020 GT 0) or (RL010_F = -1 and RL020_F = -2) or (RL020_F = -1 and RL010_F = -2)) and RL030_F= -2)

check.title: Structural - Error: DB135 - Records are missing in R- or P-file or DB135 not filled correctly
Structural - Error: DB135 - In R- or P-file records to drop (or are missing) or DB135 not filled correctly
Structural - Error: HB070 - Person who filled in the questionnaire is not household member or does not exist
check.where: HB070_F ge 0 and RHID ne HB030 and RB110 ne 5

check.title: Structural - Error: HB080 - Person 1 responsible for the accomodation is not household member or does not exist
check.where: HB080_F ge 0 and RHID ne HB030 and RB110 ne 5

check.title: Structural - Error: HB090 - Person 2 responsible for the accomodation is not household member or does not exist
check.where: HB090_F ge 0 and RHID ne HB030 and RB110 ne 5

check.title: Structural - Error: DB130 - Household data record is missing in H-file (or to drop) or DB130 not filled correctly
check.where: (DB130 = 11 and DB135 = 1 and HB030 = .) or (DB130 ne 11 and HB030 ne .)

check.title: 3-year rolling module on children: Error: routing condition (-4) not allowed on $x as there are children aged 0-15 in the household
check.where: ($x_F = -4 AND __HH_AGE_0_15_= 1) AND ($x_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: 3-year rolling module on children - Warning: routing condition (-2) not allowed on HD210 as there are children attending school
check.where: (HD210_F = -2) AND (__HH_RL020_ gt 0) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: 3-year rolling module on children - Error: RCH010 and RCH020 expected missing (-1) as RB081 (age) missing (-1)
check.where: (RB081_F eq -1) AND ( (RCH010_F ne -1) OR (RCH020_F ne -1) )

check.title: 3-year rolling module on children - Error: routing condition (-4) expected on $x as there are no children aged 0-15 in the household
check.where: (__HH_AGE_0_15_= 0 AND $x_F ne -4) AND ($x_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) expected on PK010 - no children who are not household members
check.where: (HK020 = 0) AND (PK010_F ne -2) AND (PK010_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) not allowed on PK010 - there are children who are not household members
check.where: (HK020 gt 0) AND (PK010_F eq -2) AND (PK010_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) expected on PK020 - no children aged 0-17 living in the household
check.where: (HK010_F=-2 AND PK020_F ne -2) AND (PK020_F ne -7) AND (PB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families Error: routing condition (-1) expected on PK010_F and PK030_F as HK020_F eq -1
check.where: (HK020 = -1) AND (PK010_F ne -1 AND PK030_F ne -1) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) not allowed on HK010 – there are children aged 0-17 in the household
check.where: (HK010_F = -2) AND (__HH_AGE_0_17_ = 1) AND (HK010_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) expected on HK010 – there are no children aged 0-17 in the household
check.where: (HK010_F ne -2) AND (__HH_AGE_0_17_ = 0) AND (HK010_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: Number of children who are not household members should be equal to number of RB110 = 8
check.where: (RB110 eq 8) AND (HK010_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families – Error: routing condition (-2 or -4) expected on RK010_F (Parent ID and sequential number of the child who is not household member) as there are no children external to the household
check.where: (HK020 eq 0) AND (RK010_F ne -2) AND (RB110 ge 1) AND (RB110 le 4) AND (RK010_F ne -4) AND (RK010_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families – Error: routing condition (-2 or -4) expected on RK020_F (Age of the child who is not household member) as there are no children external to the household
check.where: (HK020 eq 0) AND (RK020_F ne -2) AND (RB110 ge 1) AND (RB110 le 4) AND (RK020_F ne -4) AND (RK020_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families – Error: routing condition (-2 or -4) expected on RK030_F (Usual time the parent needs to get to the child who is not a household member) as there are no children external to the household
check.where: (HK020 eq 0) AND (RK030_F ne -2) AND (RB110 ge 1) AND (RB110 le 4) AND (RK030_F ne -4) AND (RK030_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families – Error: routing condition (-2 or -4) expected on RK040_F (Frequency of contact (via phone, social media etc.) during the last 12 months with the child who is not a household member) as there are no children external to the household
check.where: (HK020 eq 0) AND (RK040_F ne -2) AND (RB110 ge 1) AND (RB110 le 4) AND (RK040_F ne -4) AND (RK040_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families – Error: routing condition (-2 or -5) expected on RK070_F (Number of nights per month the child spends in the household as there are no children that have parents outside the household or no children external to the household
check.where: (HK010 eq 0) AND (HK020 eq 0) AND (RB110 ge 1) AND (RB110 le 4) AND (RK070_F ne -2) AND (RK070_F ne -5) AND (RK070_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families – Error: routing condition (-5) expected on RK050_F (Child having a bedroom in which to sleep) but there are no children aged 0-17 (neither in the household nor outside the household)
check.where: (HK010_F=-2 AND RK050_F ne -5) AND (RB110 ge 1) AND (RB110 le 4) AND (HK020 = 0) AND (RK050_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families – Error: routing condition (-5) expected on RK060_F (Frequency of spending actively time with the child) but there are no children aged 0-17 (neither in the household nor outside the household)
check.where: (HK010_F=-2 AND RK060_F ne -5) AND (HK020 = 0) AND (RB110 ge 1) AND (RB110 le 4) AND (RK060_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2 or -5) expected on RK080_F (Legal child custody situation) as there are no children that have parents outside the household or no children external to the household
check.where: (HK010 eq 0) AND (HK020 eq 0) AND (RB110 ge 1) AND (RB110 le 4) AND (RK080_F ne -2) AND (RK080_F ne -5) AND (RK080_F ne -7) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: Parent ID (RK010) not equal to RB030
check.where: (HK020 gt 0) AND (RK010_F gt 0) AND (HB010 eq 2021) AND (RB110 eq 8) AND (RK010 ne RB030)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) not allowed on RK010_F (ID of a child who is not a household member) as there are children external to the household
check.where: (HK020 gt 0) AND (RK010_F eq -2) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) not allowed on RK020_F (Age of the child who is not household member) as there are children external to the household
check.where: (HK020 gt 0) AND (RK020_F eq -2) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) not allowed on RK030_F (Usual time the parent needs to get to the child who is not a household member) as there are children external to the household
check.where: (HK020 gt 0) AND (RK030_F eq -2) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) not allowed on RK040_F (Frequency of contact with the child who is not a household member) as there are children external to the household
check.where: (HK020 gt 0) AND (RK040_F eq -2) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) not allowed on RK070_F (Number of nights per month the child spends in the household) as person is an adult
check.where: ((HK010 gt 0) OR (HK020 gt 0)) AND (RB082 ge 18) AND (RK070_F eq -2) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-5) not allowed on RK050_F (Child having a bedroom in which to sleep) as there are children in the household or children external to the household
check.where: (HK010_F ne -2 OR HK020 gt 0) AND (RB082 lt 18) AND (RB082 ne .) AND (RK050_F eq -5) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-5) not allowed on RK060_F (Frequency of spending actively time with the child) as there are children in the household or children external to the household
check.where: (HK010_F ne -2 OR HK020 gt 0) AND (RB082 lt 18) AND (RB082 ne .) AND (RK060_F eq -5) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-2) not allowed on RK080_F (Legal child custody situation) - as person is an adult
check.where: ((HK010 gt 0) OR (HK020 gt 0)) AND (RB082 ge 18) AND (RK080_F eq -2) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-5) not allowed on RK070_F (Number of nights per month the child spends in the household) as there are children in the household or children external to the household
check.where: (HK010_F ne -2 OR HK020 gt 0) AND (RB082 lt 18) AND (RB082 ne .) AND (RK070_F eq -5) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Module on children in recomposed families - Error: routing condition (-5) not allowed on RK080_F (Legal child custody situation) as there are children in the household or children external to the household
check.where: (HK010_F ne -2 OR HK020 gt 0) AND (RB082 lt 18) AND (RB082 ne .) AND (RK080_F eq -5) AND (HB010 ge 2021)

check.title: Structural - Warning: HY080G, HY081G - Regular inter-household cash transfer received vs alimonies (gross)
check.where: (HY080G is not null and HY081G is not null) AND (HY080G lt HY081G)

check.title: Structural - Warning: HY080N, HY081N - Regular inter-household cash transfer received vs alimonies (net)
check.where: (HY080N is not null and HY081N is not null) AND (HY080N lt HY081N)
